page.title: 07Life style
page.content: How we use our time. (written by Class 2, Woolaston ) Fifteen of our class walk to school,six come by car and two come by school bus. We start at 9a.m. and finish at 3.30p.m. with an hour for dinner. We read, do maths, English, geography, history, art and computers. Most of our dads travel to work by car. Most cars leave the village between 8 and 9 a.m. Their jobs are in engineering, shops, building, forestry and law and order. Some of our mums also work in banking, catering, teaching, cleaning and selling. All of our mums do the housework. During our leisure time, we watch T.V.,play with toys or on bikes, go to Cubs on Monday evenings and the girls go to Brownies on Wednesday evenings.
